price: Aláforíjìn-ẹ̀ṣẹ̀, Olùgba-ìronúpìwàdà, Ẹni líle níbi ìyà, Ọlọ́rẹ, kò sí ọlọ́hun kan tí a gbọ́dọ̀ máa jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo àyàfi Òun. Ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ ni àbọ̀ ẹ̀dá.
arabic: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
